content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be quite comfortable and convenient. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I think 500 euros per month is a reasonable price for this apartment. It's in the city center and has all the necessary facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros per month is not enough for me. This apartment is brand new and located in a prime area. I'm looking for a price that reflects its quality and location. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate the quality and location of the apartment. However, I think 600 euros per month is more reasonable. I am a dependable and responsible tenant who can take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 euros per month is still not sufficient for me. This apartment offers a modern living space in the heart of the city. I'm sure you'll enjoy the proximity to public transportation and amenities. How about 750 euros per month? It's a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 700 euros per month is a better price for me. I am a smart and ethical person who can respect and follow all the rules of the lease agreement. I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for. However, I'm still not convinced it's the best offer for this apartment. It's a very attractive property, and I believe it deserves a higher price. How about 725 euros per month? It's a small increase, but it reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 710 euros per month is a good price for me. I am a trustworthy and responsible tenant who will respect the rules and regulations of the lease agreement. I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 710 euros per month is a step in the right direction, but I'm still not fully satisfied. This apartment is a gem in the city center, and I believe it deserves a price that reflects its uniqueness. How about 730 euros per month? It's a fair price for both the quality of the apartment and the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 720 euros per month is a more reasonable price for me. I am a dependable and responsible tenant who will respect the rules and regulations of the lease agreement. I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 720 euros per month is getting closer to what I'm seeking. However, I'm looking for a price that not only reflects the quality of the apartment but also the services and amenities that come with it. How about 740 euros per month? It's a price that I believe is fair for all parties involved.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
